Rank System

Progress through ranks by building your team and unlocking powerful rewards. Each rank brings new opportunities, bonuses, and recognition. Start as a Starter and become a Legend!

Customer Support
Learning Resources
Secure Payouts
Mobile Access
Trusted Platform
Important:
  • You and your team must actually use services (recharge, bill pay, shopping, etc.) to earn income.
  • Income is generated only when real transactions happen in your team.
  • Only active users earn income. If a user does not recharge or use any service for 60 days, their account becomes inactive and income stops. The account/reactivation happens automatically when they use any service again.
  • This is a service-based income system. You should never force or pressure anyone to join. Only those who are genuinely interested should join, and you must not make any misleading promises or claims.
For more details and all compliance/legal information, please see the About section.
Entry

Rank 1: Starter

Requirement
Activate account, complete learning session
  • Account activation enables earning
  • Learning session & video tutorials (how to earn)
  • Pass learning to unlock Refer option
  • Refer up to 20 people (each can refer 20)
Bonus

Rank 2: Builder

Requirement
Refer 20, all complete learning
  • Income starts (earnings begin)
  • ₹500 bonus on upgrade
  • Full service access
  • Team chat enabled
Stable Income

Rank 3: Achiever

Requirement
Each of your 20 referrals refer 20
  • All features unlocked
  • Earn thousands monthly (team usage)
  • Host team meetings
  • Stable income opportunity
Awards

Rank 4: Leader

Requirement
20 direct referrals reach Rank 3
  • Extra income opportunities
  • Award functions & recognition
  • iPhone spin wheel (win prizes)
Franchise

Rank 5: Director

Requirement
20 direct referrals reach Rank 4
  • Team trips & meetings
  • Franchise opportunity
  • Earn in lakhs
Bike Gift

Rank 6: Champion

Requirement
20 direct referrals reach Rank 5
  • Bike gift opportunity
  • Top earner status
Legend

Rank 7: Legend

Requirement
20 direct referrals reach Rank 6
  • Car & sports car gifts
  • Earn in crores
  • Big achiever awards
  • Foreign trip (all paid)
  • Global recognition

Team Growth & Income Example

If each person in your team does a ₹399 recharge, see how your income grows at each rank. (3% commission split by rank)

Example: ₹399 Recharge
For every ₹399 recharge done by you or your team, 3% commission is generated and split by rank as shown below. This is the basis for the income example.
This calculation is only for recharge. If you and your team use more services (like bill payment, shopping, etc.), your total commission and income can be even higher.
Important:
  • This is a 100% legal, service-based income model.
  • Not MLM. Not a Ponzi scheme. No joining fees, no product purchase requirements.
  • You earn only when you and your team use real services (like recharge, bill pay, shopping, etc.).
  • No income for just referring or adding people—income is always based on real usage.

Important Facts & Legal Points

100% legal, service-based income. No investment, no MLM, no Ponzi.
You earn only when you and your team use real services.
No income for just referring or adding people—real usage = real income.
All KYC and security checks are mandatory.
Only one account per Aadhaar and phone number.
Your rank never goes down once achieved.
Inactive users (no service for 60 days) stop earning until they use a service again.
All trademarks and service marks belong to their respective owners.
For support or questions, contact our compliance team.
Want to know more? See the About section or contact us.
